com.ociweb.xml

Enum Version

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Version>
      • com.ociweb.xml.Version
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Version>

    public enum Version
extends java.lang.Enum<Version>
    This enum specifies the version of XML being used.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      UNSPECIFIED
      Disables writing of the "
      V1_0
      Either XML 1.0, Forth Edition or XML 1.0, Fifth Edition
      V1_1
      XML 1.1, Second Edition
      V1_2
      There is currently no standard document for "XML 1.2".

      • V1_0

      • V1_1

        public static final Version V1_1
        XML 1.1, Second Edition

      • V1_2

        public static final Version V1_2
        There is currently no standard document for "XML 1.2".

        (Nor is there likey to be one in the forseeable future -- given the current pragmatic approach illustrated by "XML 1.0, Fith Edition" changes.)
